lead_paragraph: MAZOR--Fred. The family of Burton Kassell mourns the (reluctant) passing of Dr. Fred Mazor March 6, 2016, a stellar and stalwart friend for 66 years. A graduate of Winthrop Junior High School, Tilden High School, Baruch School of Business, Smith College and Columbia University; Fred was a compassionate therapist, a fine photographer, a fencer, Air Force National Guardsman ("Ace"), a sailor, a lover of tall women and Brooklyn humor, an imbiber of Negronis (if properly made), judicious co-op board chairman, long term volunteer as therapist at the Red Cross, an intrepid collector of all that entered his life and a nonpareil procrastinator, putting off his demise until 32 months after his stroke. "His brother was worse". We miss the exuberant "hey there" greeting and all that followed. 1/3
